item.title: Paper Replication from Scratch using PyTorch
item.description:
This repository contains a collection of paper replications for various classification and object detection tasks, all implemented from scratch using PyTorch. Below, you’ll find a list of networks I’ve implemented, along with links to each respective repository. Additionally, I have pruned certain networks to enhance their real-time performance, allowing for a tunable trade-off between accuracy and efficiency.

Each implementation includes model definitions, custom loss functions, training and evaluation scripts, and visualizations.
